body_html:
Which version? I just tried it with 12rc1 successfully

export HOME=/local_home/yaroslav
mkdir -p ~/tensorflow_avx2.git
cd ~/tensorflow_avx2.git
git clone https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow.git
cd tensorflow
git tag -l
git checkout tags/0.12.0-rc1 -b 12rc1
./configure
export flags="-c opt --copt=-mavx --copt=-mavx2 --copt=-mfma --copt=-mfpmath=both --config=cuda"
bazel build $flags -k //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package
....
yaroslav@53:~/tensorflow_avx2.git/tensorflow$ bazel-bin/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/build_pip_package /tmp/tensorflow_pkg
Tue Dec 20 10:16:10 PST 2016 : === Using tmpdir: /tmp/tmp.4FiW7g3OBw
~/tensorflow_avx2.git/tensorflow/bazel-bin/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/build_pip_package.runfiles ~/tensorflow_avx2.git/tensorflow
~/tensorflow_avx2.git/tensorflow
/tmp/tmp.4FiW7g3OBw ~/tensorflow_avx2.git/tensorflow
Tue Dec 20 10:16:13 PST 2016 : === Building wheel
~/tensorflow_avx2.git/tensorflow
Tue Dec 20 10:16:48 PST 2016 : === Output wheel file is in: /tmp/tensorflow_pkg

body:
Which version? I just tried it with 12rc1 successfully

```
export HOME=/local_home/yaroslav
mkdir -p ~/tensorflow_avx2.git
cd ~/tensorflow_avx2.git
git clone https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow.git
cd tensorflow
git tag -l
git checkout tags/0.12.0-rc1 -b 12rc1
./configure
export flags="-c opt --copt=-mavx --copt=-mavx2 --copt=-mfma --copt=-mfpmath=both --config=cuda"
bazel build $flags -k //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package
....
yaroslav@53:~/tensorflow_avx2.git/tensorflow$ bazel-bin/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/build_pip_package /tmp/tensorflow_pkg
Tue Dec 20 10:16:10 PST 2016 : === Using tmpdir: /tmp/tmp.4FiW7g3OBw
~/tensorflow_avx2.git/tensorflow/bazel-bin/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/build_pip_package.runfiles ~/tensorflow_avx2.git/tensorflow
~/tensorflow_avx2.git/tensorflow
/tmp/tmp.4FiW7g3OBw ~/tensorflow_avx2.git/tensorflow
Tue Dec 20 10:16:13 PST 2016 : === Building wheel
~/tensorflow_avx2.git/tensorflow
Tue Dec 20 10:16:48 PST 2016 : === Output wheel file is in: /tmp/tensorflow_pkg

```
